title: KitchedAid 5 (more then 20 color variants, capacity 9 dozen cookies or 4 loaves of bread in single batch, 59 touch points planetary mixing, includes: Quart Stainless Steel Bowl, Coated Flat Beater, Coated Dough Hook, 6-Wire Whip, Pouring Shield)
descriptions:
Introducing the KitchenAid 5 Stand Mixer, the ultimate kitchen companion that offers more than just mixing. With over 20 color variants to choose from, this powerful mixer can handle up to 9 dozen cookies or 4 loaves of bread in a single batch. Featuring 59 touch points for planetary mixing action, this durable metal construction mixer comes with a 5 Quart Stainless Steel Bowl, Coated Flat Beater, Coated Dough Hook, 6-Wire Whip, and Pouring Shield included.

Its tilt-head design and 10 speed settings make it easy to use for all your baking needs. Plus, with over 10 optional hub-powered attachments available (sold separately), the possibilities are endless. Don't miss out on the KitchenAid 5 Stand Mixer - the must-have tool for any home baker. Elevate your baking game today!

Introducing the KitchenAid 5 Stand Mixer, the ultimate kitchen companion that offers more than just mixing! With over 20 color variants to choose from, this mixer can handle up to 9 dozen cookies or 4 loaves of bread in a single batch. The powerful 59 touch points planetary mixing action ensures thorough blending every time. 

Included with the mixer are essential items like a 5 Quart Stainless Steel Bowl, Coated Flat Beater, Coated Dough Hook, 6-Wire Whip, and Pouring Shield. The durable metal construction and comfortable handle make this mixer both reliable and easy to use. 

With a tilt-head design, 10 speed settings, and over 10 optional attachments available (sold separately), the KitchenAid 5 Stand Mixer is a versatile tool for any kitchen. Upgrade your baking game with the KitchenAid 5 Stand Mixer today!

Introducing the KitchedAid 5 stand mixer, the ultimate kitchen companion for all your baking needs! With more than 20 stunning color variants to choose from, this mixer not only looks great on your countertop but also delivers exceptional performance.

Prepare up to 9 dozen cookies or 4 loaves of bread in a single batch with ease, thanks to the 5 Quart Stainless Steel Bowl and the included accessories: Coated Flat Beater, Coated Dough Hook, 6-Wire Whip, and Pouring Shield. The durable metal construction ensures longevity, while the comfortable handle and dishwasher-safe bowl make clean-up a breeze.

Experience precise mixing with 59 touch points in a planetary motion, and enjoy the convenience of a tilt-head design with 10 speed settings. Plus, with over 10 optional hub-powered attachments available (sold separately), the possibilities are endless.

Upgrade your baking game with the KitchedAid 5 stand mixer - a must-have for any home baker!
